devdoc.details: The L1 Multi-Message Relayer contract is a gas efficiency optimization which enables the relayer to submit multiple messages in a single transaction to be relayed by the L1 Cross Domain Message Sender. Compiler used: solc Runtime target: EVM

params._messages: An array of L2 to L1 messages

params._name: Name to resolve an address for.

returns._0: Address associated with the given name.

devdoc.title: OVM_L1MultiMessageRelayer

batchRelayMessages((address,address,byte.notice: Forwards multiple cross domain messages to the L1 Cross Domain Messenger for relaying

resolve(string).notice: Resolves the address associated with a given name.
